item.title: The Tome of Horrors Complete, for Swords & Wizardry
item.dc:creator: T. Kurt Bond
item.description: My copy of Frog God Games The Tome of Horrors Complete, for Swords & Wizardry, arrived today. My, that's a massive tome: a hardback with 671 numbered pages followed by 14 pages of advertisements. (In a smaller book, I might have complained about that many pages of advertisements, but in a book this large it doesn't seem excessive.) From my earlier quick perusal of the PDF and a brief scan of the hardback today I'm very pleased with the content, and I'm looking forward to using this in my game. To the folks who worked on this: well done!
